name: AgnesDoll
description:
Explore a creepy orphanage and find out what is going on and what has happened here.

This is a students project. The ingame text is in german only for now, but ...

WE ARE WORKING ON AN ENGLISH VERSION + FIXING STUFF!

Team:
  • Annika Schwab: Art and Narrative Design
  • Moritz Ratajczak: Art and Soundtrack
  • Nino Brugger: Programming

Game Design // UE
Rapid Prototyping - Congratulations! It's A Game (WS1718)
Supervised by: Jörg Friedrich

Project Start:

25th October 2017
